abstract: Vows column on wedding of Christiana Ball and Jasper Vicenti.
lead_paragraph: A world traveler (the bride) and an early computer geek (the groom) met at a robot company.

headline.main: Christiana Ball and Jasper Vicenti: The Firebrand and the Math Whiz
headline.print_headline: In the Role of Cupid, a Neatnik Robot

snippet: A world traveler (the bride) and an early computer geek (the groom) met at a robot company.
